item.description: Getting off of Exit 2 on Route 101 proceed south on Hooksett Rd. for 0.8 miles passing Holidays Bar and Grill. Turn left onto Depot Rd. and proceed 0.2 miles passing 23 Depot Rd. There is a dirt parking lot on the left where several different hiking trails can be accessed, whether they be a woods trail, a rail trail, an old fire road, or a mountain bike trail. There is also a huge field nearby the dogs can run in. Although there are some places the dogs might access water you might not want your dog in that particular water if it is stagnant, boggy, or smells.
item.how_to_find_us: Turning off of Hooksett Road onto Depot Rd. proceed 0.2 miles passing 23 Depot Rd to the dirt parking lot on the left.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Clark Pond/Rockingham Recreational Trail/Fire Roads 2-3 mile hike Auburn, NH
